property.name: localhost
property.description: point at the node about the simulated data

property.name: huge.etl.system.run
property.description: if etl system can run, used for gracefully exit (true, false)

property.name: huge.src.gen.files.maxnum
property.description: simGen will generate the specified max number of src gdr files

property.name: huge.src.record.timestamp.iscurrent
property.description: if true, the timeStamp of the src gdr's record will be current time, else false, the timeStamp will be random time from "begin" to "end"
